Export.Routine:
#define FOREACH(%key,%value,%global) ##Continue set %key="" ##Continue for { ##Continue set %key = $ORDER(@%global@(%key)) ##Continue quit:(%key = "") ##Continue set %value = $NAME(@%global@(%key))
#define ENDFOR }
#; User Application Message Dictionary #define MessageDictionaryGlobal ^["USER"]NameSpace
#; System Application Message Dictionary #define SystemMessageDictionaryGlobal "^%qCacheMsg"
#; Get %request.Content property (app converts %request.Content into %ZEN.proxyObject in AbstractBroker) #define R(%property) %request.Content.##Expression(%property)
